    Game info:

    In a ferocious Arctic storm, distress signals are sent from a mysterious 
    Russian whaler. As leading Coast Guard veteran Tom Hansen, you board to 
    investigate ?and discover unthinkable horrors lurking beneath the 
    ship&amp;#58808; bloodstained decks.

    Brave dangerous waters: Rocked by huge breakers, you must steady your 
    nerves ?and aim ?to evade a watery grave. Keep your bearings: 
    Battle against increasingly mutated enemies in treacherous, unstable 
    environments. Unleash a torrent of weapons: Create fatal traps and use 
    shotguns, flame throwers, or any object you can find to survive.
